means: 枯掉了树梢的，衰弱的，脆弱的( doddered的过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He reeled and swayed , doddering like a drunken man to keep from falling.
sentence.Network_cn: 他像酒醉一样地晃荡着,好让自己不致跌倒.

sentence.Network_en: Spindly Austin 7's of the'20 s are venerated like doddering old aunties.
sentence.Network_cn: 修长的奥斯汀7世以及20世都已经是人们喜欢的老爷车.

PerfectNetExp.abs: West Coast的意思中文翻译 ... dodecagon 十二角形, 十二边形 doddering 震颤的, 蹒跚的 doddery 衰老的, 蹒跚的.
以g结尾的英语英文单词 ... diving 跳水 doddering 老态龙锺 doting 溺爱的.
his mother was doddering and frail .他母亲步履蹒跚，身体孱弱。
关心台湾教育BLOG: 八月 2012 ... stimulus N. 刺激品 doddering adj. 因年老而变衰弱的 treacherous adj. 背叛的;不忠的.

entry.tran: 年老体衰的，老态龙钟的(对人不敬的说法)
entry.def: If you refer to someone as a doddering old man or woman, you are saying in a disrespectful way that they are old and not strong.

example.ex: ...a doddering old man making his will before he's too senile.
example.tran: 趁尚未老糊涂之前立下遗嘱的年迈老者

means.word_mean: 1. mentally or physically infirm with age;

auth_sentence.content: A doddering and reactionary has-been who ought to have been interred long ago.
auth_sentence.res_content: A doddering and reactionary has-been who ought to have been interred long ago.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A doddering and reactionary has-been who ought to have been interred long ago.
